# hasLearnedWord(_:)

**Type Method**

Returns whether the text checker has learned the specified word.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func hasLearnedWord(_ word: String) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **word**: A string representing a word.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the class has learned the word, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Learning and Ignoring Words

- **ignoreWord(_:)**: Tells the text checker to ignore the specified word when spell-checking.
- **ignoredWords**: Returns the words that the text checker ignores when spell-checking.
- **learnWord(_:)**: Tells the text checker to learn the specified word so that it doesn’t evaluate it as misspelled.
- **unlearnWord(_:)**: Tells the text checker to unlearn the specified word.
